title: The Insane Process of Building a Yellow Tour de France Leader’s Bike | Bobby & Jens
content:
Bahrain-Victorious mechanic Filip Tišma shows us there’s so much more to being a WorldTour wrench than building bikes.

Read the full article at The Insane Process of Building a Yellow Tour de France Leader’s Bike | Bobby & Jens on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
